definition: branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

sentences.english: The branch of La plum also already answer last very thick accumulated snow.
sentences.chinese: 臘梅的枝椏也已經覆上了厚厚的積雪。

sentences.english: From the branches are interlaced branches down gently.
sentences.chinese: 從枝椏交錯的樹枝間輕輕瀉下。

sentences.english: All day long he flies back and forth from his branch to the feeder.
sentences.chinese: 這一整天，他在喂料器和枝椏之間來來回回。

sentences.english: She bid me take love easy, as the leaves grow on the tree;
sentences.chinese: 她囑咐我要愛得輕鬆，就象新葉在枝椏萌芽。

sentences.english: The jungle overhead closed over the river almost completely.
sentences.chinese: 頭上枝椏縱橫，幾乎把河面全封沒了。

sentences.english: The graceful birds flew down to rest among the thornbush 's branches.
sentences.chinese: 這些優雅的鳥飛下來，在荊棘樹的枝椏上休息。

sentences.english: I had to part the willow branches to get in;
sentences.chinese: 我得撥開柳樹叢的枝椏，這才進得去。

sentences.english: Blue magpie nests are generally built in the topmost branches of broad-leaved trees.
sentences.chinese: 藍鵲巢大多建築在高大闊葉木上層的枝椏間。

sentences.english: To bend with apples the moss'd cottage-trees.
sentences.chinese: 村舍前爬滿青苔的老樹，被蘋果壓彎了枝椏。

sentences.english: As a result, branches were overloaded and entire trees felled.
sentences.chinese: 所以，枝椏負重時纔會掀翻整棵樹木。

sentences.english: Liu, now 80, said as he played mah-jongg at a street cafe, its roof pierced by a massive wutong branch.
sentences.chinese: 擡頭看看，咖啡館的屋頂與梧桐枝椏交織在一起。

sentences.english: If threatened, they will leap from a branch, often from great heights, and escape with a splash to the water below.
sentences.chinese: 受到威脅時會從很高的枝椏上躍起，潛入水底逃逸。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
